description:
Integrate mutation testing that intentionally introduces code bugs to verify tests actually catch defects, rather than just checking coverage.

**Rationale:** High coverage doesn't mean effective tests. Mutation testing reveals which tests provide real value versus superficial coverage.
title: Mutation Testing Framework
